ISSUE.TITLE: Localization migration issues in case of multiple languages
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: nopCommerce version: 4.40+ Steps to reproduce the problem: The entries in LocalizationMigration update the locale values for all languages. It is necessary to separate the function of adding new locales from updating, so that locales for all languages are added, but updated only for the specified one. Perhaps there are other solutions. ![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/27218280/128195190-ef0d9079-8fbe-48c6-9df7-134ed1b9c1f6.png)
